item.description:
This will be our 6th meeting,
Please join us- we will continue disussing web development
and web standards related stuff.
If you are joining us for first time please email me a few sentences for each
category: Bio, areas of interest, training or specialty, and links to current websites
or projects.
I can add you to our member list that I bring copies of to the meeting this helps
us get to know eachother and have more interesting discussion as well
as create good networking resource.
Sincerely,
Leah Masci

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: October Meet up 1
